summary: The Manned Aircraft Clarification Act amends U.S. Code to limit penalties for aircraft destruction to manned aircraft, clarifying existing law. It modifies Section 32 of Title 18 and Section 46502(a)(1)(A) of Title 49, focusing on criminal penalties and aircraft definitions. The bill's intent is to specify the scope of laws concerning aircraft destruction and piracy, specifically in the context of manned aircraft.
